cyclone.name: FRED
cyclone.current_location: about 150 mi WNW of Havana, Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest across the southeastern Gulf of Mexico, then turning north toward the northern Gulf Coast (Mississippi/central Florida Panhandle)
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: northern Gulf Coast near the AL / FL Panhandle border

weather_observation.watch_coast: No coastal watches in effect; interests from Mississippi to the central Florida Panhandle advised to monitor
